title: Streamline your charging experience with two 6-in-1 charging cables for under $40
content:
Macworld

Charging cables have a way of getting lost or wearing down over time. Combat both issues with the InCharge® X Max 100W 6-in-1 Charging Cable. This precision charging solution is designed to meet all your charging needs no matter where you need to power up. Until February 25, you can get two cables for less than the price of one — only $34.97 (reg. $78).

This 6-in-1 cable is compatible with iPhones, Androids, laptops, and most other devices thanks to its various connection options, including USB-A to USB-C, USB-C to MicroUSB, USB-C to Lightning, and more. The InCharge® X Max also has exceptionally speedy 100W charging for USB-C to USB-C and iPhone fast charging up to 18W.

It also has a capacity of up to 480Mbps data transfer speeds for syncing and more. Better yet, it’s constructed with aramid fiber for increased thermal, chemical, and bending resistance, plus TPU cable guards and nylon reinforcement so that the InCharge® X Max can stand the test of time.

Upgrade your charging solution when you get a two-pack of the InCharge® X Max 100W 6-in-1 Charging Cables for just $34.97 through February 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon necessary.

 

InCharge® X Max 100W 6-in-1 Charging Cable (2-Pack) – $34.97
